title: Can't type and click in game
body: After entering the game, I can't click nor type in game. However, I can still see other people's type and they can move. I am sure I was connected. It happens on me almost like everyday. I tried to reinstall it, but the problem is still here.

replies.body: It sounds like you might be have a network issue that's failing to communicate your actions in-game.  I'd suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as your first step to rule out possibilities.  Hopefully this does the trick!
